title: CORO CORO Lovely TIME!!!
description: is a bonus CD sung by Karin Asaka, Kanata Konoe, Emma Verde, and Mia Taylor. The song is featured in Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club The Movie: Final Chapter Part 2 Blu-ray, which is included in the limited edition version of the Part 1 Blu-ray release. It will be released on March 25, 2026.

infobox.Artist: Karin Asaka, Kanata Konoe, Emma Verde, and Mia Taylor
